metadata.title: CVE-2021-33236 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in write_header in htmldoc through 1.9.11allows attackers to casue a denial of service via/htmldoc/htmldoc/html.cxx:273.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
